Docs.param: The Time Series Insights hierarchies to be created or replaced.
Docs.summary: Creates Time Series Insights hierarchies synchronously. If a provided hierarchy is already in use, then this will attempt to replace the existing hierarchy with the provided Time Series hierarchy.
Docs.returns: List of hierarchies or error objects corresponding by position to the array in the request. Hierarchy object is set when operation is successful and error object is set when operation is unsuccessful.
Docs.exception: The exception is thrown when is null.
